body:
Comment 1: 
Is there anyone who runs a FreeBSD/386 box who wants to volunteer to run a builder? A
builder is a python process that continually checks the Go source repository for new
revisions, and when one appears it will attempt to build it and update the dashbaord
with its status.

The instructions are under $GOROOT/misc/dashboard. It's pretty straightforward and
requires a small amount of CPU time on aggregate.
_Labels changed: added **os-freebsd**, **dashboard**._ _Status changed to **HelpWanted**._
